title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: The display property of an item, when set to 'none', does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Observe that the item is still displayed in the new PDF emitter.
